The butterfly curve

Posted on October 7, 2015

Have you ever thought drawing your own butterfly? I came across the butterfly curve, which was discovered by Temple Fay. The butterfly curve is produced by a parametric equation where: x = sin(t) * (e^cos(t)-2cos(λt)-sin(t/12)^5) and y = cos(t) * (e^cos(t)-2cos(λt)-sin(t/12)^5) . Where... [Read More]
